channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Inside Schumer's plot to retake the Senate
item.description: Chuck Schumer used the threat of two more Trump-appointed Supreme Court justices to bait top Democrats into running for Senate in 2026, the party lead...

item.title: FBI searches WaPo reporter's home and devices
item.description: The FBI searched the home and devices of Washington Post reporter Hannah Natanson, who covers the Trump administration's reshaping of the federal gove...

item.title: U.S. evacuates troops from Middle East bases as Trump weighs Iran strikes
item.description: The U.S. started evacuating some troops from al-Udeid Air Base in Qatar and several other bases in the region ahead of a potential military conflict w...

item.title: Trump's new push for lower rates
item.description: Interest rate cuts from the Federal Reserve aren't coming fast enough for President Trump. He's imposing policies to try to achieve easier money throu...

item.title: How Americans are grading Trump on Venezuela and Greenland
item.description: Reproduced from Reuters/Ipsos ; Note: Margin of error is ±3 percentage points for all adults and ±5 for other groups; Chart: Axios Visuals Americans a...

item.title: Vance-hosted Greenland meeting ends with ‘fundamental disagreement’
item.description: Diplomats from Denmark and Greenland had originally requested the meeting with Secretary of State Marco Rubio after provocative statements from the pr...

item.title: Trump makes obscene gesture, mouths expletive at Detroit factory heckler
item.description: A cellphone video captured Trump twice mouthing “f--- you” and raising his middle finger toward a line worker shouting at him inside the Ford factory.

item.title: FBI executes search warrant at Washington Post reporter’s home
item.description: The search came as part of an investigation into a government contractor accused of illegally retaining classified government materials.

item.title: U.S. withdraws some forces from Middle East as Trump weighs Iran strikes
item.description: The Pentagon has begun removing troops and equipment from al-Udeid Air Base in Qatar, echoing measures taken before U.S. strikes on Iran’s nuclear fac...

item.title: Supreme Court allows Illinois congressman to challenge mail-in balloting
item.description: The high court’s 7-2 ruling dealt with the narrow question of whether Republican congressman Michael Bost and others had standing to sue.

item.title: Capitol agenda: Trump tests GOP with Fed probe
Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Voters sour on Trump’s handling of the economy in new poll
item.description: The White House plans to make affordability a key selling point for Republicans across the board as the 2026 midterm elections come into focus.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
